languages.text: "К сожалению, их лидеры не нашли общий язык. Почтенный Торбальд не ладит с конклавом боевой конгрегации Механикус, слуги Омниссии не в восторге от... рьяного нрава Торбальда. Все вместе они не любят милитанта Сибилека, командующего моими силами... Точнее, не любили. Почтенный милитант погиб со своим кораблем неделю назад, когда добрые союзники не поддержали его атаку".

"Unfortunately, the leaders have failed to find a common language. The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. And neither group is fond of Militant Sibilek, who commands my forces... Were not fond, to be precise. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, их лидеры не нашли общий язык. Почтенный Торбальд не ладит с конклавом боевой конгрегации Механикус, слуги Омниссии не в восторге от... рьяного нрава Торбальда. Все вместе они не любят милитанта Сибилека, командующего моими силами... Точнее, не любили. Почтенный милитант погиб со своим кораблем неделю назад, когда добрые союзники не поддержали его атаку".

The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. And neither group is fond of Militant Sibilek, who commands my forces... Were not fond, to be precise. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."

languages.text: “但遗憾的是，那些指挥官没能达成一致。受人尊敬的索巴德指挥官与机械修会战斗议会的意见向左，而欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们认为索巴德强硬的性格令人不快。与此同时，这两个人都不喜欢我的舰队指挥官，军事学家西比克……确切地说，那已经是之前的事情了，因为那位受人尊敬的军事学家一周前刚刚阵亡。他那些高贵的盟友并没有在进攻的时候提供支援，于是他和他的旗舰一起陨灭了。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the leaders have failed to find a common language. The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. And neither group is fond of Militant Sibilek, who commands my forces... Were not fond, to be precise. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."

traits.locale_text: “但遗憾的是，那些指挥官没能达成一致。受人尊敬的索巴德指挥官与机械修会战斗议会的意见向左，而欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们认为索巴德强硬的性格令人不快。与此同时，这两个人都不喜欢我的舰队指挥官，军事学家西比克……确切地说，那已经是之前的事情了，因为那位受人尊敬的军事学家一周前刚刚阵亡。他的贵族盟友并没有在进攻的时候提供支援，于是他和他的旗舰一起陨灭了。”

languages.text: «Por desgracia, los líderes no logran ponerse de acuerdo. El estimado Thorbald no logra entenderse con el cónclave de la congregación de batalla del Mechanicus, mientras que los sirvientes del Omnissiah encuentran desagradable la naturaleza estridente de Thorbald. Y a ninguno de los dos grupos le agrada el militante Sibilek, que dirige mis fuerzas... bueno, no les agradaba. Perdimos al militante la semana pasada junto con su nave ya que sus aliados no apoyaron debidamente su ofensiva».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the leaders have failed to find a common language. The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. And neither group is fond of Militant Sibilek, who commands my forces... Were not fond, to be precise. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, los líderes no logran ponerse de acuerdo. El estimado Thorbald no logra entenderse con el cónclave de la congregación de batalla del Mechanicus, mientras que los sirvientes del Omnissiah encuentran desagradable la naturaleza estridente de Thorbald. Y a ninguno de los dos grupos le agrada el militante Sibilek, que dirige mis fuerzas... bueno, no les agradaba. Perdimos al militante la semana pasada junto con su nave ya que sus aliados no apoyaron debidamente su ofensiva».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、指揮官は共通語を見つけられていない。高貴なるトールバルド殿は技術局の戦闘員評議会と対立し、万機神の従者はトールバルドの執念深い性質に不快感を抱いている。また、双方とも、私の部隊を指揮するミリタント・シビレックを苦手としている…苦手だった、と言う方が正確か。偉大なミリタントは1週間前、貴族の協力者に攻撃の支援をしてもらえず、自らの船と共に沈んだのだ」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the leaders have failed to find a common language. The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. And neither group is fond of Militant Sibilek, who commands my forces... Were not fond, to be precise. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、指揮官は共通語を見つけられていない。高貴なるトールバルド殿は技術局の戦闘員評議会と対立し、万機神の従者はトールバルドの執念深い性質に不快感を抱いている。また、双方とも、私の部隊を指揮するミリタント・シビレックを苦手としている…苦手だった、と言う方が正確か。偉大なミリタントは1週間前、貴族の協力者に攻撃の支援をしてもらえず、自らの船と共に沈んだのだ」

languages.text: « Malheureusement, les leaders n'ont pas réussi à dialoguer. Le vénérable Thorbald est en désaccord avec le conclave de la congrégation de combat de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, et les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie sont rebutés par le caractère insistant de Thorbald. Et aucun des deux n'apprécie le militant Sibilek, qui est à la tête de mes forces... Mais j'aurais plutôt dû parler au passé : l'honorable militant a disparu avec son vaisseau voilà une semaine, lorsque ses nobles alliés n'ont pas cru bon de soutenir son offensive. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the leaders have failed to find a common language. The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. And neither group is fond of Militant Sibilek, who commands my forces... Were not fond, to be precise. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, les leaders n'ont pas réussi à dialoguer. Le vénérable Thorbald est en désaccord avec le conclave de la congrégation de combat de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, et les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie sont rebutés par le caractère insistant de Thorbald. Et aucun des deux n'apprécie le militant Sibilek, qui est à la tête de mes forces... Mais j'aurais plutôt dû parler au passé : l'honorable militant a disparu avec son vaisseau voilà une semaine, lorsque ses nobles alliés n'ont pas cru bon de soutenir son offensive. »

languages.text: "Leider ist den Anführern nicht gelungen, eine gemeinsame Sprache zu finden. Der geschätzte Thorbald streitet sich mit dem Konklave der Kampfabteilung des Mechanicus, und die Diener des Omnissiah kommen mit der ungehaltenen Art von Thorbald nicht zurecht. Und beide Gruppen mögen Militant Sibilek nicht, der meine Truppen befehligt ... Mochten, um genau zu sein. Der geschätzte Militant ist mitsamt seinem Schiff vor einer Woche untergegangen, weil seine edlen Verbündeten seine Offensive nicht unterstützt haben."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the leaders have failed to find a common language. The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."

Und beide Gruppen mögen Militant Sibilek nicht, der meine Truppen befehligt ... Mochten, um genau zu sein. Der geschätzte Militant ist mitsamt seinem Schiff vor einer Woche untergegangen, weil seine edlen Verbündeten seine Offensive nicht unterstützt haben."

languages.text: "Maalesef önderleri, ortak bir zeminde buluşamadı. Saygıdeğer Thorbald, Mechanicus meclisinin harp kurultayıyla ters düştü. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları da Thorbald'ın huysuz yapısından rahatsız oldu. Ayrıca iki taraf da kuvvetlerimin başındaki Militan Sibilek'ten hazzetmiyor... Etmiyordu yani. Muhterem Militan, asil müttefikleri bir hafta kadar önce giriştiği taarruzuna katılmayınca gemisiyle birlikte sizlere ömür oldu."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the leaders have failed to find a common language. The esteemed Thorbald is at odds with the conclave of the Mechanicus's battle congregation, and the Omnissiah's servants find Thorbald's strident nature off-putting. And neither group is fond of Militant Sibilek, who commands my forces... Were not fond, to be precise. The esteemed Militant perished along with his ship a week ago when his noble allies failed to support his offensive."
